name: OSX Capture Userspace Keylogger
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>
description:
Logs all keyboard events except cmd-keys and GUI password input.

        Keylogs are transferred between client/server in chunks
        every SYNCWAIT seconds for reliability.

        Works by calling the Carbon GetKeys() hook using the DL lib
        in OSX's system Ruby. The Ruby code is executed in a shell
        command using -e, so the payload never hits the disk.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SYNCWAIT
options.description: The time between transferring log chunks.

options.name: LOGPORT
options.description: Local port opened momentarily for log transfer
